message: Anyone here worked with openGL with Android before?? Do I need to study openGL first?? then openGL for Android or it's the same on every platform?? I want to do small project and I don't need to know everything about it so does anyone recommend a resources to start with??

data.message:
1. OpenGL ES on Android is similar to OpenGL on the desktop, it's a subset and it uses fixed-point math instead of floating point (used on the desktop), so you'll have to be familiar with that as well.
2. Yes, OpenGL is a platform independent graphics library and works on several platforms including consoles.
Why do you want to use pure OpenGL? Why not use a library or an engine?
